set.name: DMD-14 Super Deck OMG: Revenging Izumo and Holy Evil God's Secret Treasure

card.name: Summer Sonic, Channeler of Suns Left God

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova OMG/Mecha Del Sol

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or another God Nova OMG into the battle zone, you may draw a card. {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova OMG/Arc Seraphim

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.name: Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ At the end of the turn, untap all your Gods in the battle zone.

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

card.name: Loud Park, True Flashing Right God

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova OMG/Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ While this creature isn't linked, it can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a God Nova OMG from your graveyard to your hand. {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-14 Super Deck OMG: Revenging Izumo and Holy Evil God's Secret Treasure

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova OMG/Oracle

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ For each of your linked gods, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 2. ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 3 cards from your graveyard or hand and put them into your shields face down. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".)

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.
